backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, characters, posts, comments, stories, messages, and conversations with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for scrollable dropdown improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries of many frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark theme overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication flow, profile fetching, loading states, and conditional rendering of SignIn, ProfileSetupDialog, and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated app layout providing header, navigation, and page switching for Home, Messages, Characters, and Profile.
frontend/src/components/AvatarImage.tsx: Reusable avatar component generating initials fallback and cache-busted image URLs with retry logic.
frontend/src/components/CharacterFormDia: Dialog for creating or editing a character, including name, bio, and optional avatar upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays and sorts post comments and provides a form to add new comments using user or character profiles.
frontend/src/components/CreateConversati: Dialog to start a conversation by selecting characters and submitting to create a new conversation thread.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Dialog for creating a story post with an author selection, caption, and image upload with preview.
frontend/src/components/MessageThread.ts: Renders a conversation thread with messages, auto-scrolling, sender selection, and the ability to send new messages.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with author info, content, image, like button, and optional comments panel.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: Component for creating posts with text, selectable author, optional image upload, preview, and submission via createPost mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile using saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ScrollableSelect: Custom SelectContent wrapper adding scroll indicators and auto‑detecting scrollability using viewport refs and ResizeObserver.
frontend/src/components/StoriesRow.tsx: Displays a horizontally scrollable row of stories, including a create button and story thumbnails that open dialogs.
frontend/src/components/StoryViewerDialo: Dialog that shows a full-screen view of a story with author info, timestamp, image, and caption.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, characters, posts, and conversations through the backend actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom scrollbar and dropdown behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Characters.tsx: Displays the user's characters with options to create, edit, and delete them using dialogs and avatar previews.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Shows the main feed including stories, a post composer, and a sorted list of posts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/Messages.tsx: Lists conversations, allows starting new chats, and displays message threads when a conversation is selected.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Renders a user profile editor with fields for name, bio, and avatar upload, saving changes via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: React sign‑in page using Internet Identity with a styled login button, logo, and themed background.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing a mobile dropdown scrolling issue and related feature requests for the ToonSpace app.
